General.Name: Adeunis
General.Description: Adeunis Société anonyme designs, manufactures, and markets products and solutions for Internet Of Things (IoT) business to business connected objects worldwide. The company offers products, such as pulse for impulse interface, dry contacts, analog, MODBUS, sensors for temperature reading, and other connected objects and IoT wireless solutions for smart building, smart city, and smart industry sectors. It also provides on-site radio mapping, on-site deployment, training, data processing, sensor maintenance, and data decoding services. The company is headquartered in Crolles, France.
